title: How to Easily Find a Profitable Niche on Amazon KDP

tactics.name: focus_on_single_niche
tactics.description: Prioritize one niche to avoid spreading resources thin and increase success chances
steps: Study top bestselling books in that niche
source_quotes: You cannot succeed on Amazon KDP if you are focusing on too many niches

tactics.name: analyze_top_10_covers
tactics.description: Study bestselling book covers in a niche to replicate successful design elements.
steps: Analyze cover style, colors, fonts, and layout
caveats: Avoid exact copying, focus on inspired design
source_quotes: Look at the 10 best books... create something similar.

tactics.name: price_range_alignment
tactics.description: Set prices within the range of successful niche books to match customer expectations.
steps: Research price ranges of top niche books
source_quotes: Make sure your book falls within that range... customers are willing to pay.

tactics.name: niching_down
tactics.description: Focus on a specific subgroup within a niche by using criteria like age, medical condition, location, or gender to create targeted content
steps: Research top 10 books in the niche
Identify successful angles used by existing books
Select a specific demographic or characteristic to target
caveats: When the chosen niche has low search volume
source_quotes: customers want to feel special...talking to them

tactics.name: brand_building
tactics.description: Create a consistent brand identity across multiple books to build customer loyalty
steps: Choose a brand name for the niche
Publish multiple books under the brand
caveats: Requires consistent quality across all publications
source_quotes: build a brand with multiple books

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_niches
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with lower competition
source_quotes: Take time to study the titles that bestselling books in that niche use

heuristics.name: review_analysis_priority
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize deeper review analysis
source_quotes: Study hundreds of reviews... take your time to do this.

heuristics.name: review_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with higher review counts
source_quotes: build a brand with multiple books

claims.statement: Amazon KDP requires focused niche strategy to avoid resource dilution
source_quotes: You cannot succeed on Amazon KDP if you are focusing on too many niches

claims.statement: Amazon prioritizes price visibility in product listings
source_quotes: The price always shows... before they even click

claims.statement: Successful KDP authors build brands with multiple books in a specific niche
source_quotes: build a brand with multiple books

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identity with targeted problems and constraints for subniche focus
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Narrows audience and creates unique market opportunity
source_quotes: Coloring books is even very broad. You still have to choose within a subniche
